description: Meetz ai personal assistant artificial intelligence scheduler meetings email
title: Home - Meetz
introduction: Meetz is an AI Sales Lead Generator that offers fully personalized and automated outreach with an AI scheduler to book meetings. It provides real-time verified data, cross-referenced contact info, intent-based signals, personalized outreach, automated follow-ups, and AI email scheduling. The platform is GDPR, CCPA, and CPRA compliant and offers hyper-personalized messaging and automated meeting booking.

faqs.question: What data does Meetz provide?
faqs.answer: Meetz provides 165 million prospects data with 50 data points like real-time verified email and direct phone numbers.

faqs.question: Is Meetz GDPR compliant?
faqs.answer: Yes, Meetz is GDPR, CCPA, and CPRA compliant.

faqs.question: How does the AI scheduler work?
faqs.answer: The AI scheduler automatically books qualified prospects directly to your or your team members' calendar.
